pros:
I got to work on my research skills, IT skills and communication skills.
It was a positive workplace and I was able to see how business worked.
cons:
The only downside was the language barrier between French and English.
Sometimes it was difficult to grasp exactly what my employer was asking and he would have to repeat the task twice.
